content: Yes, both the Fitbit Inspire 2 and the Garmin Vivosport can connect to smartphones and computers for data tracking and analysis. The devices sync with your smartphone or computer through their respective apps, allowing you to view your fitness data and progress over time. You can also receive notifications and track your workout stats in real-time on your smartphone through the app. These apps provide detailed data analysis, including trends and patterns in your activity, allowing you to set and achieve your fitness goals more effectively.
